attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think the law should bring back dog licences again and all dogs should be tagged. any dog can be dangerous as all dogs have wolf in them..
teach the owners not punish the dogs..all owners should keep paper work on dogs up to date or its a big fine etc..all dogs should be muzzled when out..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
